name: Major Minor's Majestic March
description:
Can you guide the courageous cat, Major Minor, through this whimsical
musical adventure? Brought to you by Masaya Matsuura, the visionary
creator of the music game genre, and drawn to life by renowned artist
Rodney Alan Greenblat, Major Minor's Majestic March is an extravaganza
of music and color unlike anything you've ever experienced!
